hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: NUM_OF_CORES
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Decide how many cores for build.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
# for debugging echo $NODE_NAME hostname build_date=`date +%m-%d-%Y` echo "build date = <$build_date>" echo "USER=$USER" echo "HOME=$HOME" echo "PWD=$PWD" echo "WORKSPACE=$WORKSPACE" echo "git config --global --list"
git config --global --replace-all url."git@github.com:".insteadOf ssh://git@github.com/ git config --global --add url."git@github.com:".insteadOf git://git@github.com/
git config --global --list
# clear and reset folder if needed rm -rf /scratch/syssw/automation/jenkins/$FUSDK_MACHINE export workdir="/scratch/syssw/automation/jenkins/$FUSDK_MACHINE" # workdir="/work/jenkins/meta_sifive_build/$FUSDK_MACHINE" mkdir -p $workdir chmod a+w -R $workdir cd $workdir
lsb_release -a
echo "check repo" mkdir ~/bin PATH=~/bin:$PATH curl https://storage.googleapis.com/git-repo-downloads/repo > ~/bin/repo chmod a+x ~/bin/repo
sed -i 's@#!/usr/bin/env python@#!/usr/bin/env python3@' ~/bin/repo
export PATH=/sifive/tools/perl/perl/5.22.2/bin:$PATH export PATH=/sifive/tools/python/python/rhel8/3.9.2/bin:$PATH
which perl which python3
perl --version python3 --version
# echo "clean old meta-sifive-private" # rm -rf .repo ./* ./build # rm -rf meta-sifive-private meta-clang meta-riscv meta-openembedded openembedded-core .repo
# clone FUSDK cd ${workdir} echo ${META_SIFIVE_PRIVATE_BRANCH} repo init -u git@github.com:sifive/meta-sifive-private -b $META_SIFIVE_PRIVATE_BRANCH -m $FUSDK_MANIFEST repo sync
# OpenEmbedded-Core requires GCC 6 or newer to be available on the host system, download the pre-built one ./openembedded-core/scripts/install-buildtools -r yocto-3.2_M2 -t 20200729 . ./openembedded-core/buildtools/environment-setup-x86_64-pokysdk-linux
# Setting up Build Environment . ./meta-sifive-private/setup.sh
## cd ${workdir} git clone -b ${syssw_automation_tools_branch_name} git@github.com:sifive/syssw_automation_tools.git
if [ "${build_with_NBD_patch}" == "true" ];then if [ ${FUSDK_MACHINE} != "unmatched" ];then cd ${workdir}/syssw_automation_tools/automation_patch ./NBD-patch fi cd ${workdir}/syssw_automation_tools/automation_patch ./NBD-building-${FUSDK_MACHINE}-patch fi
if [ "${sstate_patch}" == "true" ];then cd ${workdir}/syssw_automation_tools/automation_patch ./sstate-patch fi
if [ "${gparted_patch}" == "true" ];then cd ${workdir}/syssw_automation_tools/automation_patch ./gparted-patch fi
# build fusdk PARALLEL_MAKE="-j ${NUM_OF_CORES}" BB_NUMBER_THREADS=${NUM_OF_CORES} MACHINE=$FUSDK_MACHINE bitbake $BITBAKE_PACKAGE build_result=$?
if [ "$build_result" == "0" ] ; then
rm -rf $NFS_Path/$Build_Sub_Path/$FUSDK_MACHINE/ mkdir -p $NFS_Path/$Build_Sub_Path/$FUSDK_MACHINE/
if [ "${FUSDK_MACHINE}" == "sifive-fpga" ];then # copy u-boot.itb and u-boot-spl.bin cp -f $workdir/build/tmp-glibc/deploy/images/$FUSDK_MACHINE/u-boot*.bin $NFS_Path/$Build_Sub_Path/$FUSDK_MACHINE/ cp -f $workdir/build/tmp-glibc/deploy/images/$FUSDK_MACHINE/u-boot*.itb $NFS_Path/$Build_Sub_Path/$FUSDK_MACHINE/
# copy kernel image cp -f $workdir/build/tmp-glibc/deploy/images/$FUSDK_MACHINE/Image*.bin $NFS_Path/$Build_Sub_Path/$FUSDK_MACHINE/
# copy dtb cp -rf $workdir/build/tmp-glibc/deploy/images/$FUSDK_MACHINE/dtb $NFS_Path/$Build_Sub_Path/$FUSDK_MACHINE/
# rootfs cp -f $workdir/build/tmp-glibc/deploy/images/$FUSDK_MACHINE/demo-coreip-cli*.cpio.gz $NFS_Path/$Build_Sub_Path/$FUSDK_MACHINE/ cp -f $workdir/build/tmp-glibc/deploy/images/$FUSDK_MACHINE/demo-coreip-cli*.ext4 $NFS_Path/$Build_Sub_Path/$FUSDK_MACHINE/
elif [ "${FUSDK_MACHINE}" == "unmatched" ];then ## itb and u-boot-spl.bin cp -f $workdir/build/tmp-glibc/deploy/images/$FUSDK_MACHINE/u-boot*.bin $NFS_Path/$Build_Sub_Path/$FUSDK_MACHINE/ cp -f $workdir/build/tmp-glibc/deploy/images/$FUSDK_MACHINE/u-boot*.itb $NFS_Path/$Build_Sub_Path/$FUSDK_MACHINE/
# copy kernel image cp -f $workdir/build/tmp-glibc/deploy/images/$FUSDK_MACHINE/Image*.bin $NFS_Path/$Build_Sub_Path/$FUSDK_MACHINE/
# copy dtb cp -f $workdir/build/tmp-glibc/deploy/images/$FUSDK_MACHINE/hifive-unmatched*.dtb $NFS_Path/$Build_Sub_Path/$FUSDK_MACHINE/
# rootfs cp -f $workdir/build/tmp-glibc/deploy/images/$FUSDK_MACHINE/demo-coreip-cli*.cpio.gz $NFS_Path/$Build_Sub_Path/$FUSDK_MACHINE/ cp -f $workdir/build/tmp-glibc/deploy/images/$FUSDK_MACHINE/demo-coreip-cli*.ext4 $NFS_Path/$Build_Sub_Path/$FUSDK_MACHINE/
elif [ "${FUSDK_MACHINE}" == "qemuriscv64" ];then cp -f $workdir/build/tmp-glibc/deploy/images/$FUSDK_MACHINE/Image*.bin $NFS_Path/$Build_Sub_Path/$FUSDK_MACHINE/ cp -f $workdir/build/tmp-glibc/deploy/images/$FUSDK_MACHINE/fw*.elf $NFS_Path/$Build_Sub_Path/$FUSDK_MACHINE/ cp -f $workdir/build/tmp-glibc/deploy/images/$FUSDK_MACHINE/demo*.ext4 $NFS_Path/$Build_Sub_Path/$FUSDK_MACHINE/ cp -f $workdir/build/tmp-glibc/deploy/images/$FUSDK_MACHINE/demo*.conf $NFS_Path/$Build_Sub_Path/$FUSDK_MACHINE/ cp -rf $workdir/build/tmp-glibc/work/x86_64-linux/qemu-helper-native/1.0-r1 $NFS_Path/$Build_Sub_Path/$FUSDK_MACHINE/qemu-native cp -rf $workdir/build/tmp-glibc/sysroots-uninative/ $NFS_Path/$Build_Sub_Path/$FUSDK_MACHINE/sysroots
ldd $workdir/build/tmp-glibc/work/x86_64-linux/qemu-helper-native/1.0-r1/recipe-sysroot-native/usr/bin/qemu-system-riscv64 ./$workdir/build/tmp-glibc/work/x86_64-linux/qemu-helper-native/1.0-r1/recipe-sysroot-native/usr/bin/qemu-system-riscv64 touch $NFS_Path/$Build_Sub_Path/$FUSDK_MACHINE/build_env cd $workdir/meta-sifive-private
else echo "no such a machine" fi git log | head -1 | sed 's/[^ ]* //' |xargs echo commit_of_meta-sifive-private: >> $NFS_Path/$Build_Sub_Path/$FUSDK_MACHINE/build_env echo branch_of_meta-sifive-private: ${META_SIFIVE_PRIVATE_BRANCH} >> $NFS_Path/$Build_Sub_Path/$FUSDK_MACHINE/build_env echo building_type: NORMAL >> $NFS_Path/$Build_Sub_Path/$FUSDK_MACHINE/build_env echo building_ID : ${BUILD_ID} >> $NFS_Path/$Build_Sub_Path/$FUSDK_MACHINE/build_env
fi
if [ "$delete_build" == "true" ]; then rm -rf /scratch/syssw/automation/jenkins/$FUSDK_MACHINE fi
exit $build_result
